title: COVID-19 Response
content:
The COVID-19 crisis places many of our neighbors at risk.

People without a home are already vulnerable to sickness, weather, exhaustion and malnutrition. More than ever, these brothers and sisters need our loving care.

Please help with an extra-generous gift today to keep our doors open 24/7, and to provide life-sustaining meals, shelter and other vital care during this crisis.

We receive no government funding, so we are especially dependent on your support to provide care 24/7 when people need us most.

Thank you!
